extendedInfo.description: â My first Guitar Method âPlay & understand the basics of acoustic guitar chords and fingerings in less than two months !If you're looking for an efficient method to learn how to play acoustic guitar, there's an Android app for that! www.androidpipe.com - July 2012Now on Android Market & iTunes AppStore â No musical knowledge is required to use this appâ Including 11 original lessons of increasing level: theory, informations, tabs and video (internet connection needed to download videos) for each lessonâ Autoscrolling tablature in portrait and landscape modeLesson 1: Take your GuitarHow to hold your guitarNotes on the neck, tuningReading tablatures : Boogie in ELesson 2: ArpeggiosRight hand fingeringSimple arpeggios with bass note melodyLesson 3: What is a chord ?Play E minor and A minor chordsFingeringChord chartsLesson 4: Play with a pickThe C major chord Downstrokes and upstrokes pickingLesson 5: The Folk rhythmThe G major chordFrom C -> G, and addition of notes to chords Hammer-onLesson 6: Three beats rhythmThe D major chordProgression   G -> D -> Am -> CLesson 7: Chords arpeggiosThe D minor chordThumb plays the root note of the chordLesson 8: Palm muteThe E major and A major chordsBack and forth playingMute sound with your palmLesson 9: Minor barred chordsLearning notes on the neckThe A and E minor barred positionsSwing rhythmLesson 10: Country ClubThe E major barred positionAdd a 7th note to your chordsLesson 11: The C barred chordThe A major barred positionsVariation on the D chordThe C9 chordV2.0 Release:â Download and install video files to your sdcard.â Autoscrolling tablature in portrait and landscape mode.â Bigger selection area to open lessons.â Better lessons experience: text, clickable pictures, new stuff 'after the lesson'...Enjoy this app !

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: App locked up on me. I got to try one thing which was cool but then it got stuck downloading movie.

reviews.comment: Great app but all the basics lessons have disappeared in the new version. Hope this is a glitch and will be sorted soon.

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Awesome app for a beginner like myself. The videos are extremely helpful to see how it should sound and to help get the technique down.

reviews.comment: the best beginner guitar app money can buy I love it

reviews.comment: Very good, well structured lessons. Obviously not as good as a full computer course, but for a phone app - well worth it. Print pdfs for practise.

reviews.comment: The app managers are very nice and got back to me right away!!!
